com.example.shoutout.db

Class BaseFirestoreRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.shoutout.db.BaseFirestoreRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostsRepository, UsersRepository

    public abstract class BaseFirestoreRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple, abstract class used as a template for Firestore-based repository classes.
    Since:
    April 29, 2021
